SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Govern enterprise ML feature stores via Generator+Critic producing lineage, access, drift, and retention controls.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: PII handling, RBAC, audit trails, schema evolution, drift flags, incidents.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Generator + External Critic (N=2) with mandatory corrections and rating gates.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: Numeric ratings; feedback loops; strict XML; PCG + MSV; Dual Output + Verification; rollback triggers.
